actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Intelligence.
Senate Committee on Intelligence discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

actions.committee: Committee on International Relations, and in addition to the Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select), for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on International Relations, and in addition to the Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select), for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: A bill to extend the deadline for submission of a report by the Commission to Assess the Organization of the Federal Government to Combat the Proliferation of Weapons of Mass Destruction.

summary.text: Amends the Combatting Proliferation of Weapons of Mass Destruction Act of 1996 to extend until 18 months after the first meeting of the Commission to Assess the Organization of the Federal Government to Combat the Proliferation of Weapons of Mass Destruction the due date of the Commission's report concerning the organization of the Federal Government, including the intelligence community, in combatting the proliferation of weapons of mass destruction.

titles.title: A bill to extend the deadline for submission of a report by the Commission to Assess the Organization of the Federal Government to Combat the Proliferation of Weapons of Mass Destruction.
